content: beginning crochet kids patterns these 3 patterns assume you know how to make chains and single_crochet stitches 1/ bracelet or scrunchie hair tie you will need a large elastic hair tie and about ½ oz worsted or bulky weight yarn and a crochet hook size j or k and a yarn needle make a slip knot with a 6 inch tail and place on crochet hook holding the elastic ponytail band in one hand insert the crochet hook into the center with crochet hook grab yarn and pull yarn to the front yarn over and draw a loop to the front work *1single crochet single_crochet in ring chain 5 repeat from * till no more stitches will fit in ring fasten_off leaving a 6 inch tail tie tails together firmly and use a needle to weave the ends into stitching cut off excess tails ta-dah 2/ pet snake you will need a hook sized j or k a yarn or darning needle and about 2 oz of worsted weight yarn make a slip knot and place on your hook chain 49 in second chain from hook make 2 single_crochet 2sc in each chain till you have last 2 chains left in second-to-last chain make only 1 single_crochet in last chain make 9 single_crochet slip_stitch last single_crochet to neck of the snake chain 1 turn your work so that the next row will be worked in the tops of the stitches of the first row 2sc in every stitch back toward tail of your snake at last stitch fasten_off leaving a 6 inch tail weave both ends into the work glue eyes to top of head and make a forked tongue from felt glue tongue to bottom of head name your snake and pet him 3/ change purse smaller purse shown you will need a crochet hook size h or i and about 1 ½ oz worsted weight wool yarn lion brand wool works well for this project acrylic fiber will not felt make a slip knot and chain 21 row 1-- single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain chain 1 turn row 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet to end of row chain 1 turn repeat row 2 till you have 24 row fold rectangle so that ten row are laying over 10 row and 4 row are not part of the fold crochet together the first side by working 1 single_crochet through both pieces in the ends of the row single_crochet the end row of the 4-row flap 3 single_crochet in corner of flap to turn single_crochet in 7 single_crochet across flap chain 30 fasten_off starting at other side of fold crochet other side together and repeat directions for working around flap till you reach the chain slip_stitch into base of chain attach yarn at center bottom of purse and chain 30 fasten_off and weave attaching end into purse bottom wash the purse in the washing machine in hot
